passives.name: Astral Fire Extension
passives.desc:
Astral Fire use +1

When using Astral Fire:
 â€¢ Becomes 2-hit  PG attack; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Slight Astral Fire status effect boost

While Astral Fire buff active:
 â€¢ BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Fire) ( PI magic  PG attack; moderate BRV damage boost)
 â€¢ HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Fire) ( PI magic  PG attack +  PF attack)

passives.name: Umbral Ice Extension
passives.desc:
When using Umbral Ice:
 â€¢  PG hit count increased to 2; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Moderate Umbral Ice status effect boost

While Umbral Ice buff active:
 â€¢ BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Ice) (high turn rate;  PJ magic  PG attack)
 â€¢ HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Ice) (increased BRV based on ATK +  PF attack)

While Astral Fire buff active:
 â€¢ Umbral Ice becomes Umbral Ice+ (grants 8 turns MAG ATK Up I to self)
passives.short_desc: Umbral Ice Extension: Boost to Umbral Ice
